verses.verse: So these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> Job, <S%H347><s%> because he was righteous <S%H6662><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Then the wrath <S%H639><s%> of Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel, <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite, <S%H940><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of Ram, <S%H7410><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Job. <S%H347><s%> His wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> because he justified <S%H6663><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> rather than God. <S%H430><s%>

Also his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against his three <S%H7969><s%> friends, <S%H7453><s%> because they had found <S%H4672><s%> no answer, <S%H4617><s%> and yet had condemned <S%H7561><s%> Job. <S%H347><s%>
Now Elihu <S%H453><s%> had waited <S%H2442><s%> to speak <S%H1697><s%> to Job, <S%H347><s%> because they were elder than he. <S%H2205><s%>

When Elihu <S%H453><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was no answer <S%H4617><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of these three <S%H7969><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite <S%H940><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> <S%H559><s%> "I am young, <S%H6810><s%> and you are very old; <S%H3453><s%> Therefore I held back, <S%H2119><s%> and didn't <S%H3372><s%> dare show <S%H2331><s%> you my opinion. <S%H1843><s%>
I said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3117><s%> 'Days should speak, <S%H1696><s%> and multitude <S%H7230><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> should teach <S%H3045><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>'
But <S%H403><s%> there is a spirit <S%H7307><s%> in man, <S%H582><s%> and the breath <S%H5397><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> gives them understanding. <S%H995><s%>
It is not the great <S%H7227><s%> who are wise, <S%H2449><s%> nor the aged <S%H2205><s%> who understand <S%H995><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%>
Therefore I said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H8085><s%> 'Listen to me; <S%H2331><s%> I also will show my opinion. <S%H1843><s%>'
"Behold, <S%H3176><s%> I waited for your words, <S%H1697><s%> and I listened <S%H238><s%> for your reasoning, <S%H8394><s%> while you searched out <S%H2713><s%> what to say. <S%H4405><s%>
Yes, <S%H995><s%> I gave you my full attention, but there was no one who convinced <S%H3198><s%> Job, <S%H347><s%> or who answered <S%H6030><s%> his words, <S%H561><s%> among you.
Beware lest you say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H4672><s%> 'We have found wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> God <S%H410><s%> may refute <S%H5086><s%> him, <S%H376><s%> not man;'
for he has not directed <S%H6186><s%> his words <S%H4405><s%> against me; <S%H7725><s%> neither will I answer him with your speeches. <S%H561><s%>
"They are amazed. <S%H2865><s%> They answer <S%H6030><s%> no more. <S%H6275><s%> They don't have a word to say. <S%H4405><s%>
Shall I wait, <S%H3176><s%> because they don't <S%H1696><s%> speak, because they stand still, <S%H5975><s%> and answer no more? <S%H6030><s%>
I also will answer <S%H6030><s%> my part, <S%H2506><s%> and I also will show <S%H2331><s%> my opinion. <S%H1843><s%>
For I am full <S%H4390><s%> of words. <S%H4405><s%> The spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H990><s%> me constrains me. <S%H6693><s%>
Behold, <S%H990><s%> my breast is as wine <S%H3196><s%> which has no vent; <S%H6605><s%> like new <S%H2319><s%> wineskins <S%H178><s%> it is ready to burst. <S%H1234><s%>
I will speak, <S%H1696><s%> that I may be refreshed. <S%H7304><s%> I will open <S%H6605><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> and answer. <S%H6030><s%>
Please don't <S%H5375><s%> let me respect any man <S%H376><s%>'s person, <S%H6440><s%> neither will I give flattering titles <S%H3655><s%> to any man. <S%H120><s%>
For I don't <S%H3045><s%> know how to give flattering titles; <S%H3655><s%> or else my Maker <S%H6213><s%> would soon <S%H4592><s%> take me away. <S%H5375><s%>
